channel.title: Project Warscape
channel.description:
█Story█ There was a breakout in GodWars and all the GodWars dungeon monsters came out and destroyed Almost everyone except 2 Humans named Chino and Killer. Killer wanted to keep the Gods in the world of Gielinor still being worshipped. Chino wanted to bring down the order of gods and let him be The new order of Gods. Killer wanted to stop this but for sometime they managed to keep peace then suddenly Chino got his clans man and destroyed all the Statues of Gods and Alters. Killer pushed them out of Excetaria into Miscellania where the Unforgiven Clan war formed. They got their name from the Legendary Pker's who gave them this name for being destroyers of gods. So now these 2 Clans fight for the world of Gielinor(runescape). [img]http://static2.filefront.com/images/personal/s/sainteel/150892/whosbomxry.jpg[/img]
█Layout█ Edited from Czarsource CryptChaos 2.5 Pretty Much like a Permanent castle wars
█Goals & Achievements█Legend green=Done red=Undone█ Add Emote List instead of teleports(like most czar sources) Made it automatically Give a permanent team when you walk in a portal(Credit to Mikeyofadown) Adding Prayer+Icons Challenging Training Challenging Money Perfect Magic(No massing on monsters like most czar sources) Armory for both teams and portals Remove all the old Mini Games and add the real requirements to spells Split out all the hits so it won't glitch and hit at same time Remove Lots of unneeded drops from monsters
█Pictures█ (Will be added later)

item.title: Project Warscape
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

The Reaper X:

And your story line doesn’t make complete sense. Killer is the aggressive one who loves pking and killing, while Chino is more civilized economically focused, although you have the Chino killing Guthix. It just doesn’t make sense.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Warscape
item.dc:creator: @range_2her range 2her
item.description:
@range_2her wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:2, topic:246884”][quote author=range 2her link=topic=325850.msg2553934#msg2553934 date=1227773377]
█Story█
There was a breakout in GodWars and all the GodWars dungeon monsters came out and destroyed Almost everyone except 2 Elderly Powerful Humans named Chino and Killer. Killer wanted to keep the PVP going in the world of Gielinor. Chino wanted to restore the economy and world of humans Guthix tried to restore piece but Chino destroyed him. Killer was very angry over this and divided into 2 clans and they fight in the world of Gielinor forever.
[/quote]
Why would Chino kill Guthix… I thought that would be something the “Killers” would do…?

█Credits█
40% To Mikeyofadown(for Teaching me how to make a member or team1 or team2 in character file)
10% CryptChaos (I had to delete more things then I added)
5% Czar(for the main base)
45% Chino and Killer(Fixing lots of bugs adding emote to emote tab adding Mage bow special Making admin+ Not trade,drop, or lose items when they die. Whole new pk point system that autoranks you on a board for how much of ever of the other team you kill)

Remove the percents, and they’re fine.

Looks creative, good luck.[/quote]What do you mean?

Read full topic

item.title: Project Warscape
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“range 2her, post:1, topic:246884”]█Story█
There was a breakout in GodWars and all the GodWars dungeon monsters came out and destroyed Almost everyone except 2 Elderly Powerful Humans named Chino and Killer. Killer wanted to keep the PVP going in the world of Gielinor. Chino wanted to restore the economy and world of humans Guthix tried to restore piece but Chino destroyed him. Killer was very angry over this and divided into 2 clans and they fight in the world of Gielinor forever.[/quote]
Why would Chino kill Guthix… I thought that would be something the “Killers” would do…?

[quote=“range 2her, post:1, topic:246884”]█Credits█
40% To Mikeyofadown(for Teaching me how to make a member or team1 or team2 in character file)
10% CryptChaos (I had to delete more things then I added)
5% Czar(for the main base)
45% Chino and Killer(Fixing lots of bugs adding emote to emote tab adding Mage bow special Making admin+ Not trade,drop, or lose items when they die. Whole new pk point system that autoranks you on a board for how much of ever of the other team you kill)[/quote]
Remove the percents, and they’re fine.

Looks creative, good luck.

█Story█
There was a breakout in GodWars and all the GodWars dungeon monsters came out and destroyed Almost everyone except 2 Humans named Chino and Killer.
